snippet: The store’s books — 4,000, perhaps — are organized by subject: bread, sauce, breakfast, etiquette. But Ms. Slotnick also stocks biographies, memoirs and even manuscripts.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Bonnie Slotnick Cookbooks, vintage cookbook shop in Greenwich Village.
lead_paragraph: The store’s books — 4,000, perhaps — are organized by subject: bread, sauce, breakfast, etiquette. But Ms. Slotnick also stocks biographies, memoirs and even manuscripts.

headline.main: At Bonnie Slotnick Cookbooks, Recipes to Feed Your Mind and Body
